plant.name: TestButtons
plant.cabbagecode: image $INVIS bounds(0, 0, 140, 20), identchannel("testaudio_box"), visible(0) { button $HY_BTN pos(0, 3), size(20, 16), channel("testaudio_L"), text("L","ON"), latched("0"), value(0), popuptext("Test Noise: Left"), automatable(0) button $HR_BTN pos(20, 3), size(40, 16), channel("testaudio_Mono"), text("Mono","ON"), latched("1"), value(0), popuptext("Test Wav: Mono"), automatable(0) button $HY_BTN pos(60, 3), size(20, 16), channel("testaudio_C"), text("C","ON"), latched("0"), value(0), popuptext("Test Noise: Center"), automatable(0) button $HR_BTN pos(80, 3), size(40, 16), channel("testaudio_Stereo"), text("Stereo","ON"), latched("1"), value(0), popuptext("Test Wav: Stereo"), automatable(0) button $HY_BTN pos(120, 3), size(20, 16), channel("testaudio_R"), text("R","ON"), latched("0"), value(0), popuptext("Test Noise: Right"), automatable(0) }
plant.help: This is temporary text... where does this get used?
